input_text:
Job Title: 2024 Business Technology Solutions  Internship

Location: North Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Legal, Management, Other

Description:
Company Description

AbbVie's mission is to discover and deliver innovative medicines and solutions that solve serious health issues today and address the medical challenges of tomorrow. We strive to have a remarkable impact on people's lives across several key therapeutic areas – immunology, oncology, neuroscience, and eye care – and products and services in our Allergan Aesthetics portfolio. For more information about AbbVie, please visit us at www.abbvie.com. Follow @abbvie on Twitter, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube and LinkedIn.

Job Description

Envision spending your summer working with energetic colleagues and inspirational leaders, all while gaining world- class experience in one of the most dynamic organizations in the pharmaceutical industry. This is a reality for participants in the BTS Internship Program at AbbVie.

BTS Internship Program Description

As an AbbVie intern, you will participate in a paid 10-12 -week summer program that involves social and development activities, along with housing benefits for eligible students. You will work on meaningful assignments that have a real impact on our business and patients worldwide, while also combining technical and business knowledge with analytical strength and creative problem- solving .

AbbVie’s worldwide business offers you an opportunity for a variety of potential work experiences that are aligned to a variety of functional areas, including: Business Analytics, Project Management, Data Analytics, Data Science, Application Technology, Emerging Technology, Design & Architecture, Digital Technology, and Information Security

The majority of BTS Interns will be placed in Lake County, IL, though there is a possibility of being placed within any U.S. AbbVie or Allergan Aesthetics location. Placements will be based on business need and individuals' preference .

AbbVie strongly considers high performing interns as candidates for the Business Technology Solutions Development Program (BTSDP). AbbVie’s BTSDP is a two-year rotational program with three separate work assignments. The rotations are carried out in a variety of areas that include managing projects, technical development, systems analysis, and business process review. The goal of the program is to identify and develop AbbVie’s future BTS leaders.

Qualifications

Minimum Qualifications: 

Pursuing a bachelor's degree in related discipline: Management Information Systems, Information Technology, Computer Science, Data Science, Business Analytic s, Dat a Analytics, Computer Engineering, User Design, Business Administration with a minor or concentration in one of the above fields; or related fields Graduation date between August 2024 – July 2026 Must be enrolled in school the semester following your internship School or work experience using Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint 

Preferred Qualifications:

Graduation date between August 2024 – July 2025 preferred Ideal candidates will combine technical and business knowledge with analytical strength and creative problem-solving abilitiesPrevious internship or related experience Proven track record of teamwork, adaptability, innovation, initiative, and integrityExcellent communication, leadership, and project management skillsCumulative GPA of 3.00 or higher preferred 

Additional Information

AbbVie is committed to operating with integrity, driving innovation, transforming lives, serving our community and embracing diversity and inclusion. It is AbbVie’s policy to employ qualified persons of the greatest ability without discrimination against any employee or applicant for employment because of race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex (including pregnancy), physical or mental disability, medical condition, genetic information, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, marital status, status as a protected veteran, or any other legally protected group status.

Experience Level (if available): Internship

output_json.title: 2024 Business Technology Solutions Internship
output_json.summary: Internship program at AbbVie offering world-class experience in the pharmaceutical industry.

Engage in social and development activities
Work on meaningful assignments impacting business and patients worldwide
Apply analytical strength and creative problem-solving
Gain experience in various functional areas
Possibility of placement in Lake County, IL or any U.S. AbbVie or Allergan Aesthetics location
Opportunity for high-performing interns to join the Business Technology Solutions Development Program (BTSDP)
output_json.company_information: AbbVie is a pharmaceutical company focused on discovering and delivering innovative medicines and solutions.

other.content: Minimum qualifications include pursuing a bachelor's degree in related disciplines, graduation between August 2024 – July 2026, enrollment in school the semester following the internship, proficiency in Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint.
